promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic rare frilled-lizard psychic-type pokemon wearing dark bracers. It can be found in castle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, psychic or frilled-lizard. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bracergon, a a gigantic rare frilled-lizard psychic-type pokemon. It can be found in castle-like environments It has the following abilities: Synchro Loud, Rock Bullet. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "frilled-lizard", "psychic" or "Bracergon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of psychic-type pokemon, frilled-lizard-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dreamy background
generatedDescription: Castle dweller, this colossal, rare, mind-bender reptile employs its resonating shouts and stone missiles in defense.
